channel.title: Tech on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on FinanClub

item.title: TTD
item.description: score:87 Chances: The Trade Desk Inc. has a strong position in the technology platform for advertising buyers, providing a range of products including audio advertising, mobile advertising, and data management platform. Ark Invest’s continued investment in The Trade Desk Inc. indicates confidence in the company’s future growth potential.

item.title: U
item.description: score:-495 Chances: Unity Software Inc. (U) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. Shares of game engine maker Unity (NYSE:U) jumped 6.5% in the afternoon session after The Federal Reserve maintained its key interest rate for the third consecutive time, holding it within the targeted range of 5.
